name: Cannon Egg
description:
This is a simple game to test your thinking ability.
In this game, you are have to put the egg into the basket. You can change the cannon direction to estimate where the egg will fall and you can set the cannon power to throw the egg.
There are several levels that can be played. Each level has different difficulties. High levels are not necessarily more difficult, depending on how you play.

In each level you will find some barriers, one of which is a fire that can burn your eggs, so be careful

You have 6 lives, if your life is up, you are at risk to repeat the game from the beginning.

Enjoy the game. Play all levels
